name: Arman Cohan Assistant Professor
research: Arman Cohan is an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science Department at Yale University. Prior to joining Yale, he was a Research Scientist at Allen Institute for AI (AI2). At Yale, he leads the Natural Language Processing lab. His research spans various problems at the intersection of NLP and Machine Learning, including language modeling, representation learning, retrieval, and applications in specialized domains.
prospective_students: The page does not provide specific information on how prospective students should approach Arman Cohan.
